meanings.definition: A person who is addicted to shopping.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a shopaholic and can't resist buying new clothes every week.
meanings.sent2: Shopaholics often find themselves spending more money than they intended.
meanings.sent3: The shopaholics in our group always joke about needing a shopping intervention.
meanings.sent4: Her room looked like a battlefield after the shopaholics' shopping spree.
meanings.sent5: The shopaholic's obsession with shopping was as strong as a magnet pulling them to the mall.

meanings.sent1: Shopaholics tend to buy things even when they don't need them.
meanings.sent2: I have a group of shopaholics friends who love going to the mall every weekend.
meanings.sent3: The shopaholics in the family always end up with overflowing closets.
meanings.sent4: The shopaholics' addiction to shopping was like a never-ending cycle.
meanings.sent5: The shopaholics' urge to shop was as strong as a tidal wave crashing into the store.
